title: THE PASSAGE: Worst TV Pilot Ever
author: Think Story
comment: Had fun watching this for all the wrong reasons! 😂😂
Laughing about a SARS like pandemic. Huh, that didn't age well.
They did a very good job selecting the child actress! She is talented as hell! The show has potential!
I actually liked the pilot, and the little girl actress is talented as hell.

Don’t judge this series based on this first episode. It usually takes a show a few episodes, sometimes even a whole season to find its footing. The series does actually get better as time goes on, with some really interesting visual storytelling. If you don’t give bacon time to sizzle, you’ll never see how good it really tastes.
description:
So I just watched Fox's new show, "The Passage" and found it laugh out loud hilarious. Here's why!
